entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
